verses.text: Give hearing \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer, O God; \w and|strong="H1732"\w* let \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* ear \w be|strong="H1732"\w* shut against \w my|strong="H1732"\w* request.

\w Give|strong="H0238"\w* thought \w to|strong="H0430"\w* me, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H5956"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* answered: I \w have|strong="H0430"\w* been made low \w in|strong="H0430"\w* sorrow;

I am troubled because of \w the|strong="H6030"\w* voice of \w the|strong="H6030"\w* cruel ones, because of \w the|strong="H6030"\w* loud cry of \w the|strong="H6030"\w* evil-doers; for they put a weight of evil on \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H7181"\w* they are cruel in their hate for \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H7563"\w* deeply wounded, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fear \w of|strong="H6963"\w* death \w has|strong="H3588"\w* come \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* shaking \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* deep \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w covered|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0935"\w* said, If only \w I|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H0935"\w* wings like \w a|strong="H0935"\w* dove! \w for|strong="H0935"\w* \w then|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0935"\w* would \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* flight \w from|strong="H0935"\w* here \w and|strong="H0935"\w* be \w at|strong="H0935"\w* rest.
\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* go wandering far away, \w living|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* waste land. (Selah.)
\w I|strong="H2009"\w* would quickly take cover \w from|strong="H7368"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* driving storm and \w from|strong="H7368"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* violent wind.

Send destruction \w on|strong="H7307"\w* them, O Lord, make \w a|strong="H7307"\w* division \w of|strong="H7307"\w* tongues among them: for I have seen fighting \w and|strong="H7307"\w* violent acts \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7307"\w* town.

\w By|strong="H3588"\w* day \w and|strong="H7200"\w* night \w they|strong="H3588"\w* go round \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*, \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls; trouble \w and|strong="H7200"\w* sorrow \w are|strong="H2555"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w of|strong="H0136"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.
\w Evil|strong="H0205"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* there; cruel rule \w and|strong="H3915"\w* deceit \w are|strong="H5999"\w* ever \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* hater \w who|strong="H3808"\w* said evil \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w that|strong="H3808"\w* would \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* grief \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* outside \w the|strong="H3808"\w* number \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* friends \w who|strong="H3808"\w* made \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* strong against \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* would \w have|strong="H3808"\w* kept myself \w from|strong="H4185"\w* him \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* secret place;

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* equal, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* guide, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* well-loved friend.
We \w had|strong="H3045"\w* loving talk together, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* went \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* house \w of|strong="H3045"\w* God \w in|strong="H3045"\w* company.

\w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1004"\w* death \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* suddenly, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w living|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* underworld; \w because|strong="H0834"\w* evil \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* hearts.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H3381"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3381"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* saviour.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* evening \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* morning \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* middle \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* day \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w with|strong="H0413"\w* sounds \w of|strong="H0430"\w* grief; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w will|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* ears.

\w He|strong="H6153"\w* has taken \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul away \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* attack which \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* against \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* peace; \w for|strong="H1993"\w* great numbers were against \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

God \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* thought \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* early times \w is|strong="H5315"\w* strong \w will|strong="H1961"\w* send pain \w and|strong="H5315"\w* trouble \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*. (Selah.) \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* unchanged, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H5315"\w* God.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* put \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w against|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* peace \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*; \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kept \w his|strong="H8085"\w* agreement.

\w The|strong="H7971"\w* words \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* mouth \w were|strong="H3027"\w* smoother than butter, but war \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* heart; \w his|strong="H7971"\w* words \w were|strong="H3027"\w* softer than oil, but \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* sharp swords.

\w Put|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H1697"\w* \w cares|strong="H3820"\w* \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H1697"\w* support; \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* not let \w the|strong="H1697"\w* upright man \w be|strong="H1697"\w* moved.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* underworld; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cruel \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* false \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* half \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* ended; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.
